cards.title: Lady of the Wood
powers: Select a damage type. {LadyOfTheWood} deals 1 target 1 damage of the chosen type.
incapacitatedAbilities: Select a damage type. Until the start of your next turn, increase damage of the chosen type by 1.
1 Hero may discard a card to regain 3 HP

cards.title: Rainpetal Coat
body: The first time {LadyOfTheWood} would be dealt 1 damage each turn, she regains 1 HP instead.

flavorQuotes.text: It is raining! Dance with me!

cards.flavorReference: Lady of the Wood, The Wanderer's Requiem #146

cards.title: Suncast Mantle
powers: {LadyOfTheWood} deals herself 1 fire damage and 1 target 4 fire damage.
body: Increase damage dealt by {LadyOfTheWood} by 3 as long as her HP is 5 or less.

flavorQuotes.text: She's keepin' this whole place alive, and it's killin' her. She's spread herself too thin.

cards.title: Thundergrey Shawl
powers: {LadyOfTheWood} deals up to 2 targets 1 lightning damage each.
body: Whenever {LadyOfTheWood} deals 2 or less damage to a target, that damage is irreducible.

flavorQuotes.text: Lady! This weather becomes you.{BR}Quite the other way around.

cards.title: Snowshade Gown
body: Whenever {LadyOfTheWood} regains HP, you may select a target that has not been dealt damage this turn. {LadyOfTheWood} deals that target 1 cold damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I didn't think you made it. {BR}One of us did not

cards.title: Spring
body: Whenever {LadyOfTheWood} deals toxic damage to a target, she regains that much HP.

flavorQuotes.text: Nature doesn't believe in second{BR}chances. After all, why stop at two?

cards.flavorReference: The Scholar, A King Among Fools #10

cards.title: Summer
body: Increase fire damage dealt by {LadyOfTheWood} by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: You shoud all cover your eyes.

cards.title: Fall
body: Whenever {LadyOfTheWood} deals lightning damage to a target, reduce damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of your next turn.

flavorQuotes.text: Lightning is the excalamation mark{BR} to every sentence autumn speaks.

cards.title: Winter
body: Whenever {LadyOfTheWood} deals cold damage to a target, draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Its an awful quiet.{BR}It is the silence of an indrawn breath.{BR}Just wait.

cards.flavorReference: Starlight and Lady of the Wood, Starcrossed #72

cards.title: Rebirth
body: When this card enters play, put up to 3 cards from your trash beneath it.
Whenever {LadyOfTheWood} destroys a target, put a card from beneath this one into your hand.
When there are no cards beneath this one, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Wielding the old magic has left me{BR}hollow. But she is the old magic.

cards.title: Enchanted Clearing
body: Reduce damage dealt to {LadyOfTheWood} by 1

flavorQuotes.text: On her turf, on her terms.

cards.title: Serenity of Dawn
body: At the end of your turn, if {LadyOfTheWood} dealt no damage this turn, she regains 2 HP and you may draw a card.
If {LadyOfTheWood} deals 3 or more damage to a target, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: This is how I will{BR}always remember her.

cards.title: Meadow Rush
body: Draw a card.
Search your deck for a Season card. Put it into your hand, then shuffle your deck.
You may play a card.
cards.flavorReference: The Dreamer, Perchance to Dream One-Shot

cards.title: Frost on the Petals
body: {LadyOfTheWood} deals 1 target 3 toxic damage or up to 3 targets 1 cold damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: On what planet does {BR} winter follow spring?

cards.title: Fire in the Clouds
body: {LadyOfTheWood} deals 1 target 3 fire damage or up to 3 targets 1 lightning damage each.

cards.title: Nobility of Dusk
body: Once per turn when {LadyOfTheWood} would deal damage you may increase that damage by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: This is an ill omen.{BR}For them.

cards.title: Calm Before the Storm
body: Discard any number of cards.
Increase the next damage dealt by {LadyOfTheWood} by X, where X is 2 plus the number of cards discarded this way.

flavorQuotes.text: The Lady's holding back.{BR}I need her to not.

cards.title: Crown of the Four Winds
powers: {LadyOfTheWood} deals 1 target 1 toxic damage, a second target 1 fire damage, a third target 1 lightning damage, and a fourth target 1 cold damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Whatever direction you run, your{BR}destination will be the same.

cards.flavorReference: Tempest, Temple of the Four Winds #2
